document.docAuthor: Pacheco Da Silva, Vitor C., Kaydan, Mehmet Bora & Basso, Cesar
document.masterDocTitle: Pseudococcidae (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha) in Uruguay: morphological identification and molecular characterization, with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Pseudococcidae (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha) in Uruguay: morphological identification and molecular characterization, with descriptions of two new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Unidad de Entomología, Departamento de Protección Vegetal, Facultad de Agronomía, Universidad de la República, Montevideo, Uruguay
Imamoglu Vocational School, Çukurova University, 01330, Adana, Turkey & Çukurova University, Biotechnology Application Research Centre, Balcalı, Adana, Turkey

Unidad de Entomología, Departamento de Protección Vegetal, Facultad de Agronomía, Universidad de la República, Montevideo, Uruguay & cbasso. bis @ gmail. com; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0003 - 0427 - 3631

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material studied.
URUGUAY : Melilla , ex leaves of
Hedera
sp. ( Araliaceae ), 34°45’11.8”S 56°18’29.8”W ,
20.iii.2019
, coll. Martínez , V ., 1 adult ♀ , ECFA No. 197;
same locality and collector, ex leaves of
coleus scutellarioides
( Lamiaceae ),
30.iv.2019
, 8 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 211;
Montevideo , ex leaves of
Hoya carnosa
( Asclepiadaceae ), 34°51’58.7”S 56°11’39.1”W ,
29.i.2018
, coll. Garcia, A. , 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 21;
same locality and collector, ex leaves of
Capsicum
sp. ( Solanaceae ),
6.iii.2018
, 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 50;
same city, ex leaves of
Kalanchoe coccinea
var. Blossfeldiana ( Crassulaceae ), 34°46’04.9”S 56°14’47.8”W ,
5.iii.2018
, coll. Pacheco da Silva , V .C. and Martínez, V ., 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 58;
ex leaves of
Aeonium
sp. ( Crassulaceae ), 34°49’56.5”S 56°13’18.4”W ,
3.iii.2019
, coll. Altesor, P. , 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 177;
ex leaves of Ficus lyrata ( Moraceae ), 34°53’47.4”S 56°07’16.8”W ,
7.v.2019
, coll. Pacheco da Silva , V .C., 6 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 223;
ex leaves of
Nerium oleander
( Apocynaceae ), 34°53’49.6”S 56°07’13.8”W ,
6.xii.2019
, coll. Pacheco da Silva , V .C., 3 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 276;
ex flowers of
Cannabis sativa
( Cannabaceae ),
18.x.2018
, coll. Collazo, D. and Rousserie, G. , 1 adult ♀ , ECFA No. 155;
ex fruits and leaves of
Solanum lycopersicum
, 34°49’55.4”S 56°13’10.2”W ,
24.ii.2019
, coll. Pechi, E. , 3 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 207;
same city, locality and collector, ex roots of
Ipomoea batatas
( Convolvulaceae ),
28.xi.2019
, 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 273;
Salto , ex fruits of
Citrus x limonia
( Rutaceae ), 31°23’10.5”S 57°43’01.8”W ,
14.xii.2017
, coll. Lorenzo, M.E. , 2 adult ♀♀ , ECFA No. 14
.

Hosts. Polyphagous, reported from 226 species belonging to 83 plant families (
García Morales et al. 2016
). In Uruguay ,
Pl. citri
was recorded on
Bougainvillea
sp. ( Nyctaginaceae ),
Euphorbia pulcherrima
( Euphorbiaceae ), Ficus sp. ( Moraceae ),
Gardenia jasminoides
( Rutaceae ),
Justicia carnea
( Acanthaceae ),
Malus domestica
( Rosaceae ),
Nerium oleander
( Apocynaceae ),
Olea europaea
( Oleaceae ),
Pyrus communis
( Rosaceae ),
Vitis vinifera
( Vitaceae ) (
Granara de Willink et al. 1997
),
Citrus limon , C. sinensis , C. reticulata
( Rutaceae ), Ficus carica ( Moraceae ),
Solanum tuberosum
( Solanaceae ) ( Trujillo Peluffo 1930 ) and
Laurus nobilis
( Lauraceae ) ( Ruffinelli 1967 ).
